title: Cannot get into Alpha at all
body: I have uninstalled and reinstalled the alpha client. It goes to update and it disappears. I relaunch it and it gives me a bug splat. I was originally advised to remove league completely and reinstall. I did that too but still am receiving a bugsplat upon launch of the client. Please advise. Thank you.

replies.body:
There may be an issue with your drivers or hardware, as these commonly caused bugsplats to happen. Check out [this guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) for some steps that can help resolve this type of issue.

Let me know if this resolved the issue.

Hi, sorry for the late reply. All my drivers are up to date. I have verified that completely. I have tried uninstalling my antivirus and running the client as well with no luck. I had a ticket opened as well and used the hextech repair tool but that didn't help either.

Updated completely this time using Run as Administrator 
Crashed once tried to get to login screen
